sql.create: create table planet (name varchar(128) not null primary key, radius int(11) not null, population int(11) not null);(

create table javatypes (id int(5) not null primary key auto_increment, intt int(5), longg bigint(5), doublee double(20,10), floatt float(20,10), bytee tinyint(5), booleann bit(1), charr char(5), shortt smallint(5), blobb blob, stringg varchar(255));
